comment: Several existing drugs that are well studied, inexpensive and widely available have been shown to act as prophylactics in COVID infections. The EAU issued to vaccine developers is reserved for situations in which there are no alternative treatments.
amr:
# ::snt Several existing drugs that are well studied, inexpensive and widely available have been shown to act as prophylactics in COVID infections. The EAU issued to vaccine developers is reserved for situations in which there are no alternative treatments.
